title: World War Z - The Lost Files - Max Brooks ( Unabridged Audio Boo
description:
This is the new "The Lost Files" sections of the World War Z book that didn't make it into the abridged audio book. Basically, this book and the current abridged version = an unabridged version. Just FYI, the torrent currently on TPB that claims that it's the unabridged version of the book, isn't, it's the abridged version. Anyways, enjoy the fruits of my labor, it was damn difficult to figure out how to remove the drm from this audible title for free.

Please seed as I will be unable to seed for very long due to my shared internet connection.

 



Fans of Max Brooks' original abridged recording of World War Z: An Oral History of the Zombie War will be thrilled to add this companion piece to their audio library. Offering listeners five hours of previously unrecorded content, World War Z: The Lost Files features 21 Hollywood A-list actors and sci-fi fan favorites performing stories not included in the original abridged edition.

Narrators of World War Z: The Lost Files are Academy Award-winning director Martin Scorsese, Spiderman star Alfred Molina, The Walking Dead creator Frank Darabont, rapper Common, Firefly star Nathan Fillion, Shaun of the Dead's Simon Pegg, F. Murray Abraham, RenÃƒÂ© Auberjonois, Bruce Boxleitner, Nicki Clyne, Denise Crosby, Ade M'Cormack, Parminder Nagra, Masi Oka, Kal Penn, JÃƒÂ¼rgen Prochnow, Jeri Ryan, Paul Sorvino, David Ogden Stiers, Brian Tee, and Ric Young. Max Brooks reprises his role as The Interviewer.
